DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis to be tested is whether follicular addition of Methylprednisolone can efficiently control late follicular progesterone rise during IVF treatment
DOC.brief_title: Methylprednisolone Addition in IVF Treatment of Infertile Couples
DOC.detailed_description: The aim is to investigate any potential advantages of adding cortisone supplementation from the follicular phase onwards with regard to premature luteinization, oocyte quality, embryo quality and pregnancy outcome.
DOC.criteria: less than 36, more than 10 antral follicles, FSH<12 endometriosis stage III&IV,
